What source are you using? PimpScape or Testscape? Or diffrent?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 11:44:51 PM[/size][hr]Mod ash not all servers have it like that.

item.title: Help me! i need to make a admin account?
item.dc:creator: @Mod.Ash Mod.Ash
item.description:
@Mod.Ash wrote:

After you create the guy (just log onto server) then go into your source and open the folder that says
“character”
then click on the notepad that says ur guys name
and in there you will see

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = *****
character-password = ****

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2979
character-posy = 9500
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1
character-lastlogin = 20070124
character-energy = 99956
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 3649

change to were it says “character-rights = 0”
change the 0 to
1 for mod
2 for admin
3 for owner

Read full topic
